General.Name: Dycasa SA
General.Description: DYCASA Sociedad Anónima operates as a construction and services company in Argentina and internationally. It undertakes roadworks; port works; architectural works; hospital, educational, cultural, and sport complexes; underground works; commercial and industrial construction works; water and sanitation works; works for nuclear power plants; and mining works. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Av. Leandro N. Alem 986, Buenos Aires, Argentina, C1001AAR
